channel.description: Recent content in epidemiology on Andriy Koval

item.title: United States Response to the COVID-19 Pandemic, January-November 2020
item.description: The paper tracks the response of US government to the unfolding pandemi of COVID-19

item.title: Epidemic Modeling of the Onset of Social Activities (EMOSA Models)
item.description: Epidemic Models of the Onset of Social Activities (EMOSA Models) are applied to religious participation of emerging adults, evaluating whether such behaviour as attending church services a better explained by diffusive or contagious mechanisms of spread
